name: Marcus Ware
description:
MARCUS WARE

Marcus Ware is a game about surviving short minigames and fighting Marco Antonio as the final boss. Every minigame is unique.

Marcus Ware was inspired by Nintendo games such as Wario Ware and Rhythm Paradise.

Everything in the game is controlled with two buttons:   and keyboard keys.

Hope you like it : )

Game made for a mont jam by:

  • Carlos Madroñero (@madrofus8 )
  • Samuel Nuez (@samuelnuez00 )
  • Victor Rubio (@TheReal_LeGord)
  • Joel Torrent (@_jowent)

Follow us on Twitter to see future projects!
